body_part_breakdown.arms_analysis: Arm strength showed inconsistency with recurring elbow flare issues during mid-week sessions. While elbow tuck technique improved in intermediate sessions (score 85), flare resurfaced when fatigued. Recent session demonstrated control during push movements but requires ongoing reinforcement.
body_part_breakdown.legs_analysis: Leg engagement remains underdeveloped with ankle instability appearing as sudden weakness in latest session. While maintaining plank position, legs lacked consistent drive to stabilize movement chain. Proper foot positioning regressed under fatigue conditions.
body_part_breakdown.core_analysis: Core stability showed significant progression - early severe hip sag issues evolved into bracing strength by later sessions. Neutral spine maintenance improved notably, though endurance faltered under advanced loads. Recent midline integrity indicates developing core resilience.

recommended_plan.expected_benefit: Reinforces elbow tuck pattern while providing progressive overload - targets recurring fault pattern shown in multiple successful sessions
Addresses ankle instability found in latest session; develops proprioception for better weight distribution and leg stabilization
Builds on demonstrated strength at 92-score mastery; promotes core endurance under advanced loads

best_workout_reason: Demonstrated mastery across all form metrics - maintained perfect depth with controlled tempo, eliminated elbow flare through full range of motion, showcased advanced core bracing under increased load, and achieved highest recorded XP with streak bonus.
